channel.title: Theme on Eorus
channel.description: Recent content in Theme on Eorus

item.title: How I Build My Jamstack Site With Hugo, Cloudflare Pages and Git?
item.description: For a long time, I wanted to create a site to transfer my notes and share my experiences. Two important points were both adapting to the developing Jamstack trend and creating a completely self-produced theme that fits the semantic html structure.

item.title: Creating a New Theme
item.description:
Introduction

This tutorial will show you how to create a simple theme in Hugo. I assume that you are familiar with HTML, the bash command line, and that you are comfortable using Markdown to format content. I’ll explain how Hugo uses templates and how you can organize your templates to create a theme. I won’t cover using CSS to style your theme.
